alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:23AM EST until February 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In New York, Southern Saratoga and Southern Washington Counties. In Vermont, Eastern Windham County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates Wednesday evening may reach 1 inch per hour at times before transitioning to a wintry mix.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
